TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlFormatExtensionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlFormatExtensionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlFormatExtensionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定服務描述格式延伸在一或多個延伸點上執行。

span.span: Specifies that a service description format extension runs at one or more extension points.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務描述格式延伸能擴充如何產生使用 ASP.NET 建立 XML Web 服務的服務描述。A service description format extension extends how a service description is generated for an XML Web service created using ASP.NET. 具體來說，服務描述格式延伸會將 XML 項目加入至服務描述。Specifically, a service description format extension adds XML elements to the service description. 如需 SOAP 延伸模組的資訊不放在服務描述執行 XML Web 服務，用戶端和伺服器端上建置的 SOAP 擴充功能時，這非常有用。This is useful when a SOAP extension is built to run on both the client and server side of an XML Web service, as information about SOAP extensions is not placed in the service description. 如果您想要將 SOAP 擴充功能的相關資訊新增至服務描述，用戶端可以解譯，它必須執行特定的 SOAP 擴充功能。If you want to add information about the SOAP extension to the service description, a client can interpret that it must run the specific SOAP extension. 必須同時在用戶端和伺服器上執行的 SOAP 擴充功能例子，就是加密 SOAP 擴充功能。An example of a SOAP extension that must run on both the client and server is an encryption SOAP extension. 如果只在伺服器上執行的是加密 SOAP 擴充功能，它會傳回值加密再將它們送回用戶端，用戶端必須執行才能解密 SOAP 訊息的 SOAP 擴充功能。If an encryption SOAP extension runs only on the server and it encrypts return values before sending them back to the client, the client must have the SOAP extension running to decrypt the SOAP message. 否則，用戶端無法處理傳回的值。Otherwise, the client cannot process the return value. 使用下列步驟來建置服務描述格式延伸：Use the following steps to build a service description format extension: 1. 建立衍生自類別。Build a class that derives from . 2. 套用至類別，並指定其服務描述格式延伸應該能夠執行的擴充點。Apply a to the class and specify the extension points at which the service description format extension should run. 3. 選擇性地套用至類別，並指定做為新的擴充點的類別內的成員。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify a member within the class that acts as a new extension point. 4. 選擇性地套用至類別，並指定要與服務描述格式延伸模組所產生的 XML 項目關聯的 XML 命名空間前置詞。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify the XML namespace prefix to be associated with XML elements generated by the service description format extension. 5. 設定服務描述格式延伸模組內執行`serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes`組態檔區段。Configure the service description format extension to run within the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` section of the configuration file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用的服務描述格式延伸可以執行的類型清單中包含的內建於 ASP.NET 和 Web 伺服器上設定任何自訂類型。The list of available types with which a service description format extension can run include those built into ASP.NET and any custom types configured on the Web server. 下列清單中的內建於 ASP.NET 可以執行的服務描述格式延伸的型別：The types built into ASP.NET that can run with a service description format extension are in the following list: - - - - - - - - - 這些類別全都參考區段，在服務描述，由 ASP.NET 所產生的。These classes all refer to sections, within a service description, that are generated by ASP.NET. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/VB/source.vb#2)]
